about_the_game:
Step into a neon-lit cyberpunk world as the manager of a club where lonely clients seek to fulfill their desires. Build android girls from scrap, match them to clients’ needs, and ensure every guest leaves satisfied. Earn money, research new technologies, and dive into your clients’ personal stories—help them solve their problems or make things worse. The choice is yours.

Manage every detail of your club: keep track of finances, restock supplies, assign tasks to your android workers, analyze clients’ needs and desires, and stay informed by monitoring news that shapes the world around you.

Assemble android girls from scrap, design unique models, and customize their abilities to suit your club’s demands. Level them up, install upgrades, and recycle older androids to create even better ones using their parts.

Bond with your clients, uncover their problems, and decide their fate. Will you help them overcome their struggles or push them to the edge and watch them fall?

content_descriptors.notes: Synthetica: Cyber Club Manager is a management simulation game that involves running a high-end social club in a cyberpunk world. While the game does not contain explicit sexual content, it does include themes of intimacy and relationships as part of its night club simulation. Players manage interactions and cater to the desires of clients seeking companionship from androids, which is suggestive but never visually depicted. The game is designed for a mature audience, with an emphasis on strategy and club management within a futuristic setting.

detailed_description:
Step into a neon-lit cyberpunk world as the manager of a club where lonely clients seek to fulfill their desires. Build android girls from scrap, match them to clients’ needs, and ensure every guest leaves satisfied. Earn money, research new technologies, and dive into your clients’ personal stories—help them solve their problems or make things worse. The choice is yours.

Manage every detail of your club: keep track of finances, restock supplies, assign tasks to your android workers, analyze clients’ needs and desires, and stay informed by monitoring news that shapes the world around you.

Assemble android girls from scrap, design unique models, and customize their abilities to suit your club’s demands. Level them up, install upgrades, and recycle older androids to create even better ones using their parts.

Bond with your clients, uncover their problems, and decide their fate. Will you help them overcome their struggles or push them to the edge and watch them fall?
name: Synthetica: Cyber Club Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Run a cyberpunk club for lonely souls. Manage your business, craft unique android workers, and change clients’ lives through your decisions. Will you lead your club to success or let it fade into the shadows?
